channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Very uneven pavement surface. Potential trip hazard., 7th May
item.description:
It's the path up through Pittville Park along the west side of the Park. It's on the east side of Tommy Taylors Lane
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tommy Taylors Lane, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: TMC - Defects - Road Markings problem, 7th May
item.description:
28 day with road closure needed please refresh stop markings appropriately 5 metres best out of hours unable to measure size is approximately (Faded Road Markings)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 7th May
item.description:

item.title: Looks like old tarmac in drain probably from resurfacing, 7th May
item.description:
Drain between 62 & 64 church street. This drain always struggles to cope with heavy rain at the best of times and floods the drive of 64

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 64, Church Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grass verge and hedge blocking visibility, 7th May
item.description:
Hedge and grass verge going through Knightsbridge. It has become very dangerous getting out of slate mill lane. The visibility has got bad on the left coming from Coombe Hill and the other way towards Cheltenham is getting bad. With bad visibility and the speed the cars come down the road, there will be an accident.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Footways Slabs problem, 7th May
item.description:
28 day with give an take plus temporary footway closure needed please lift an replace x1 sunken broken 900x600x20mm slab and replace with new slab number 1 (FW Broken Slabs)
Report on FixMyStreet
